summary: Recently released from prison, an ex-mafia boss tries not to fall into his old habits, but surviving outside of the mafia is harder than it seems.
cast: Paul Sorvino|Michael Rapaport|Renee Props|Andrea Nittoli Kelly|Lev Gorn|Steven Bauer|Chazz Palminteri|Paul Ben-Victor|Hassan Johnson|Johnny Williams|Andrea Navedo|Roberta Wallach|Kevin Kelly|William DePaolo|Michael Sorvino|Logan Crifasi-Zenie|John Damroth|Olivia Panepinto|Mario Ruffo|Andrea Verdura|Kenneth Kopolovicz|Steve Mittelman
title: Last I Heard
